pr_title: Print 'ItemChannelLink' configuration in output of console commands

timeline.message:
Print ItemChannelLink configuration in output of console commands

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

timeline.bodyText: addChannelLink comes from a time when there were also ThingLinks. Since they do not exist anymore, I wonder if we shouldn't rather simplify the command to be simply link and unlink again, just as the help text says. Wdyt?
timeline.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: Yes, I agree. We are using it in the new UI too and it should be the new openHAB naming. I will change it.
replies.author: cweitkamp

timeline.message:
Renamed subcommands to link/unlink

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
